prompt: Use <tool_call> to schedule a call. Tool signature: schedule_call(name:str, day:str, hour:str). Request: Book sync with Nina tomorrow at 09:00.
Tool signature: file_rma(order_id:str, reason:str). Request: Start RMA for order 88-100 because screen shatters.
Tool signature: escalate_ticket(case_id:str, severity:str). Request: Escalate case C-7781, major outage.
